name: Techno Softwares
description:
Techno Softwares is a software development company that provides services like software development and maintenance, big data, IT consultancy,mobile and web application development and software quality assurance and testing. We believe in 'Value Addition, Beyond Imagination'.
We have an experience of over 13  years in this field and have a high success rate with over 90% of satisfied clients which include some of the biggest names from the industry.
The young and zealous minds are always at work to provide the most technologically sound solutions at Techno softwares.  We provide the best-in-class software experience for our clients within their budget and have a reputation of being punctual to the dot. We use the latest in-vogue technology to provide the best solutions to our clients. Hire the highly experienced and professionally qualified team of Techno Softwares to ensure that you get what you desire in the best possible way.
